snippet: The Argentine public's excessive reaction to the news that President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner has cancer is an alarming reminder that she has personalized power far too much.
abstract: The Argentine public's excessive reaction to the news that President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner has cancer is an alarming reminder that she has personalized power far too much.
lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES - Argentinians breathed a sigh of relief on Wednesday when President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner's spokesman announced that the operation to remove her cancerous thyroid gland had gone off without a hitch. Supporters gathered outside the hospital since Tuesday night cheered in jubilation.
